    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
    Hello world!
    AppTest
    Unit test for simple App.
    BuilderDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing the mapping between builders and their assigned projects.
    BuilderMenu
    Console menu for Builder users.
    Client
    Represents a client associated with a project.
    ClientTest
    Unit test class for Client.
    InputUtil
    Utility class for standardized input reading from the console.
    LoginView
    Handles user login interactions and directs users to the appropriate menu based on role.
    Main
    Entry point of the Builder Portfolio Management application.
    MainMenuView
    Displays the main menu of the application and handles top-level user choices.
    ManagerDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing the mapping between managers and their assigned projects.
    ManagerMenu
    Console menu for Project Manager users.
    Project
    Represents a project with its details, including associated client, assigned builder, project manager, and project status.
    ProjectDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing Project entities in memory.
    ProjectService
    Service class responsible for handling project-related business logic.
    ProjectStatus
    Enum representing the possible status values of a project.
    ProjectStatusTest
    Unit test class for ProjectStatus enum.
    ProjectTest
    Unit test class for Project.
    ProjectView
    Handles all project-related interactions in the console UI.
    RegisterView
    Handles user registration flow from the console UI.
    Role
     
    ServiceFactory
    Factory class providing centralized access to singleton service instances.
    Session
    Manages the current logged-in user session in the application.
    User
    Represents a user in the system, which can be either a Project Manager or a Builder.
    UserAlreadyExistsException
    Custom exception thrown when attempting to create or register a user that already exists in the system.
    UserDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing User entities in memory.
    UserNotFoundException
    Custom exception thrown when a user is not found in the system.
    UserService
    Service class handling user-related business logic, including registration, login, and fetching user details.
    UserTest
    Unit test class for User.
    ValidationUtil
    Utility class for validating user roles based on their userId.
